title: Russia's Putin: U.S. enforcement of own laws abroad unacceptable
text:
May 25, 2018 / 2:48 PM / Updated 3 hours ago Russia's Putin: U.S. enforcement of own laws abroad unacceptable Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
ST PETERSBURG, Russia (Reuters) - Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Friday it was unacceptable for the United States to apply its own rules beyond its borders. Russian President Vladimir Putin delivers a speech during a session of the St. Petersburg International Economic Forum (SPIEF), Russia May 25, 2018. REUTERS/Grigory Dukor
“We need to put an end to that, this is unacceptable,” Putin said at an economy forum in St. Petersburg. Reporting by Katya Golubkova, Christian Lowe and Denis Pinchuk; Writing by Maria Tsvetkova; editing by Vladimir Soldatkin and Tom Balmforth
